widgets.title: Personal Curriculum Vitae

items: Description: Personal Curriculum Vitae using Qwik with browser print compatibility
Feature: Static Site Generation | Server Site Rendering | Browser Printing | Github Page Deployment

widgets.title: Movie Viewer
widgets.subtitle: Author & Maintainer
items: Description: A Lightweight Preact App provides browse and search movies with ease
Feature: Trending Spotlight | Movie Browsing | Movie Details & Trailers | Search Movies
Technology: Preact/React/Million | Tailwind CSS | Vite | Typescript | Biome | Bun | Commitlint | Semantic Release | CI/CD

widgets.title: PlantUML Previewer

items: Description: Image Previewer for PlantUML in Java Swing
